name: SONIC
0:
”Alexa open SONIC”
”Alexa ask SONIC for locations”
”Alexa ask SONIC what's new”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sonic
des: Craving the Drive-In? The SONIC Alexa Skill will bring you closer than ever to the food you love! Easily find a local Carhop with our Location Finder. Discover new menu items and preview what we have cooking in the kitchen!
